sourcesContent:
export const BOT_STEPS = Object.freeze(
    keyMirror({
    INTRO: null,
    ASK_NAME: null,
    GET_NAME: {isUserInput: true},
    NICE_TO_MEET: null,
    NICE_TO_SEE: null, 
    DESCRIBE_PROCESS: null,
    ASK_MATH_EXPRESSION: null,
    GET_MATH_EXPRESSION: {isUserInput: true},
    MATH_EXPRESSION_RESULT: null,
    BOT_FEEDBACK: null
}))


export const NEXT_STEP = Object.freeze({
    INTRO: BOT_STEPS.ASK_NAME,
    ASK_NAME: BOT_STEPS.GET_NAME,
    GET_NAME: BOT_STEPS.NICE_TO_MEET,
    NICE_TO_MEET: BOT_STEPS.DESCRIBE_PROCESS,
    NICE_TO_SEE: BOT_STEPS.DESCRIBE_PROCESS, 
    DESCRIBE_PROCESS: BOT_STEPS.ASK_MATH_EXPRESSION,
    ASK_MATH_EXPRESSION: BOT_STEPS.GET_MATH_EXPRESSION,
    GET_MATH_EXPRESSION: BOT_STEPS.MATH_EXPRESSION_RESULT,
    MATH_EXPRESSION_RESULT: BOT_STEPS.BOT_FEEDBACK,
    BOT_FEEDBACK: BOT_STEPS.ASK_MATH_EXPRESSION
})
